name: Globulus
description:
Globulus is a fast-paced action/arcade-puzzle game that requires players to use their fast reactions and brain power to achieve success. You Control a Globulus. Globulus' can morph through walls both horizontally and vertically. It is this mechanic that will be the difference between success and failure. Will you be setting the fastest time amongst your friends or simply scraping through?

Sign-in through Facebook to compare high scores with your friends. The game boasts 72-levels across 8 different worlds and comes with a 15 song sound track.
